name: Escape from Dungeon (yunxinfeng)
description:
Escape from Dungeon is a typical escape room game. Players need to find the key or the code to escape the Dungeon by following the clues in the room.

Players need to use the clues given by the skeleton to deduce the correct door, code and key to escape the dungeon.

Movement: WASD & mouse

Interact key: Press F & left mouse click
